0: Thieves steal a U-Haul trailer with a casket, body inside of it NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR A happy ending for a family heading to Kirtland, New Mexico to bury their loved one. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Late Sunday night, police say an SUV hauling a U-Haul trailer was stolen outside a Residence Inn in southeast Albuquerque. Inside that trailer was a casket and the body of the family's loved one. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Advertisement NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Police say the couple was traveling from Oklahoma to Kirtland, NM to bury the woman's father. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Around 11 a.m. APD says it found the stolen SUV, trailer and casket with the body inside near Gibson and Girard. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR APD hasn't arrested anyone for the theft yet, but believe their suspects are already in custody for separate crimes. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR The Bernalillo County Sheriff's Office confirms deputies arrested Anthony Serna, Jeremy Soliz, and Daniel Gonzalez this morning after they were spotted driving recklessly near Isotopes Park in a red pick-up truck. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Witnesses say they saw the same red pick-up truck at the hotel just before the U-Haul was stolen. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Investigators processed the truck for DNA and fingerprints. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR AlertMe spotted
